channel.title: How to make it so only donator's can use claws?
channel.description:
well i have a donator in the players files
it equals 0 if hes not a donator and 1 if he is
the item id is this 8002 can you tell me what code to put in and where i should put it thanks <3

item.title: How to make it so only donator's can use claws?
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

then, in your item.cfg put this -

public static final int[] donator_items = {8002};

Read full topic
item.source: How to make it so only donator's can use claws?

item.title: How to make it so only donator's can use claws?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

client.java add this:

if (wearID = 8002 && donator != 1) { GoFalse = true; sM("You need to be a donator to wear this!"); }

Read full topic
item.source: How to make it so only donator's can use claws?
